name: Valentines day Special â¤ï¸ | 14th Feb, Fri | 4-6pm
description:
Hey there! Looking to do something super fun and new to celebrate this
Valentines Day with your partner/friend/sibling/ parent?  
Come by and paint with us at Paint Bar, and make two canvas' that join to make
one picture! With step by step instructions and all materials provided, we
make it easy for you to paint, even if you have never painted before!

> Step by step guidance by an artist  
> 12 by 16 inch canvas each person  
> Beginner friendly

name: Masterclass : A detailed painting experience | 16th Feb, Sun | 11am-3pm
description:
We reallyyy heard all of you, and have introduced our **Masterclass : A
detailed painting experience** workshop!  
Well, this workshop is Pro in the sense of the details in the painting and the
size of the canvas, but maintains Paint Bar's essence of 'Anyone Can Paint'
with step by step guidance from our senior artist!  
  
Take home an acrylic painting sized 16 by 20 inches at the end of this 4 hour
session which also includes a lunch & networking break , and also learn the
different techniques of painting.  
  
> Step by step guidance by our Senior artist, Nishitha Gowda  
> Learn stencilling, blending, detailing, colour mixing and highlighting
> techniques.  
> 16 by 20 inch stretched canvas  
> Beginner friendly  
> Includes a non alcoholic beverage & Brik Oven Pizza ğŸ•  

Location : Paint Bar, Sadashivnagar, Bangalore  
Find directions to our studio here ->
